ComicInfo.Summary: Clari and her friends have survived the Inquisitor brigade's assault unscathed, but two other Warriors of Dawn have not, so the group retreats to the nearest fortress, the Village of Orphans. There, Clari is reunited with her friend Mecomi, who runs the orphanage. Then Mecomi asks Clari's aid in saving one of her young charges. Will she help her friend, or stand by her team?
ComicInfo.Title: Adventure Finders
